<h3 id="X31447">X(31447) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {BEVAN, STAMMLER, STEINER}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 6*a^4+3*(b+c)*a^3-2*(4*b^2+3*b*c+4*c^2)*a^2-3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31447) = 7*X(3)+3*X(3679) = 9*X(3)+X(5881) = 3*X(3)+7*X(9588) = 3*X(3)-13*X(31425) = 2*X(5)+3*X(3579) = 7*X(5)-12*X(3634) = X(5)-6*X(6684) = 13*X(5)-18*X(10172) = 4*X(5)-9*X(11231) = 17*X(5)-12*X(12571) = 11*X(5)-6*X(18483) = 8*X(5)-3*X(22793) = 7*X(3579)+8*X(3634) = X(3579)+4*X(6684) = 2*X(3579)+3*X(11231) = 11*X(3579)+4*X(18483) = 4*X(3579)+X(22793) = 2*X(3634)-7*X(6684) = 17*X(3634)-7*X(12571) = 22*X(3634)-7*X(18483) = 27*X(3679)-7*X(5881) = 13*X(6684)-3*X(10172) = 8*X(6684)-3*X(11231) = 17*X(6684)-2*X(12571) = 11*X(6684)-X(18483) = 7*X(9588)+13*X(31425)</b>
<p>X(31447) lies on these lines:
{3,3679}, {5,516}, {6,31444}, {10,548}, {20,5818}, {30,31399}, {40,3526}, {57,31480}, {140,4301}, {165,382}, {355,3528}, {517,631}, {519,15712}, {549,24680}, {551,12108}, {632,28194}, {942,31452}, {946,16239}, {999,31436}, {1385,3244}, {1572,31492}, {1656,28198}, {1657,19875}, {1698,3843}, {1703,31487}, {1706,31494}, {3091,28202}, {3312,31440}, {3522,28208}, {3523,3654}, {3621,5657}, {3627,3828}, {3628,5493}, {3655,10299}, {3656,10303}, {3855,9778}, {3859,28178}, {3861,10175}, {4309,18527}, {4317,5122}, {4330,5445}, {4669,14891}, {4677,15706}, {4701,5690}, {5054,7991}, {5067,12699}, {5070,9589}, {5072,19876}, {5442,5919}, {5587,17800}, {5790,16192}, {5882,12100}, {6361,7486}, {7765,31443}, {7982,15720}, {9575,31470}, {9605,31431}, {9607,31430}, {9624,12702}, {9681,13973}, {9709,31446}, {9711,31445}, {10165,11278}, {11522,15694}, {12778,15057}, {13464,14869}, {15696,28160}, {17552,26062}, {17578,28154}, {17583,24987}, {18481,21734}, {19862,28212}, {28232,31253}</p>
<p>
X(31447) = midpoint of X(40) and X(18493)<br>
X(31447) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (18480, 5818), (18492, 9956)<br>
X(31447) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3579, 6684, 11231), (3579, 11231, 22793), (9588, 31425, 3)<br>
</p>
